com.ostrichemulators.semtool.rdf.engine.util

Class NodeDerivationTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ostrichemulators.semtool.rdf.engine.util.NodeDerivationTools

  • public class NodeDerivationTools
extends Object
    This class is responsible for providing a number of utility methods for the SEMOSS system, specifically in the area of producing concept collections from gross RDF content, and deriving predicates.
    Author:
    Wayne Warren

      • createConceptList

        public static List<URI> createConceptList(IEngine engine)
        Produces a list of concepts based on a given engine that has digested a RDF knowledgebase.
        Parameters:
        engine - The RDF knowledgbase
        Returns:
        A list of concepts in URI form

      • createInstanceList

        public static List<URI> createInstanceList(URI concept,

      • getPredicatesBetween

        public static ListQueryAdapter<URI> getPredicatesBetween(URI subjectNodeType,
                                                         URI objectNodeType)
        Derive a query adapter capable of pulling out the predicates that connect all subject nodes of a given type and all object nodes of a given type
        Parameters:
        subjectNodeType - The type (in URI form) of the subject node
        objectNodeType - The type (in URI form) of the object node
        Returns:
        A proper query adapter capable of querying a knowledgebase for the desired predicates

      • getPredicatesBetween

        public static List<URI> getPredicatesBetween(URI subjectNodeType,
                                             URI objectNodeType,
                                             IEngine engine)
        Get a list of predicates that connect subjects and objects of given types
        Parameters:
        subjectNodeType - The type of subject node
        objectNodeType - The type of object node
        engine - The engine, which contains a digested knowledgebase, which will run the query designed to derive the various predicates between the node types
        Returns:
        A list of predicates, in URI
